Name: Sikara
Details: Sikara is a desert world that contains several nomad groups that wander out in the desert and are able to survive in the aggressive ecosystem despite its deadly wildlife, including a mythical huge slug that travels in the sands and is able to devour entire BattleMechs. There's only one permanent settlement on the planet, that contains the only spaceport, used mainly by offworlders, usually traders of a wax produced by local insect species that is collected by the nomads and widely used for illegal hallucinogenic proposes.
